articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: José Mourinho's Roma survive Bayer Leverkusen onslaught to reach final - The Guardian
articles.description: Roma withstood intense pressure to draw 0-0 at Bayern Leverkusen to seal a 1-0 aggregate semi-final win and a place in the Europa League final
articles.content:
José Mourinho will have a chance to claim a sixth European trophy after Roma reached the Europa League final by holding Bayer Leverkusen to a 0-0 draw.
Roma went through 1-0 on aggregate after winni… [+766 chars]

articles.author: Joe Krishnan
articles.title: Novak Djokovic's coach shouts 'what the f**k is wrong with you' in heated Italian Open row - Express
articles.description: Novak Djokovic received a verbal lashing from his coach Goran Ivanisevic as tensions threatened to boil over at the Italian Open in Rome.
